title: Complete Invader Zim Series and The Bad Art Collection
description:
Ooookay, a few things: First off, this is not just a collection of TV shows (and the TV shows don&#039;t have text or subs, sorry.) This a collection of two types of work by Jhonen Vasquez: 

The entire collection of Invader Zim TV episodes, well known to many. All three seasons are present, from "The Nightmare Begins" to "The Most Horrible X-mas Ever."

The Bad Art Collection, an obscure title unknown to many, including hardcore Vasquez fans, is in fact a bad art collection. It&#039;s like Satan&#039;s coloring book. Most memorable line: "My God, it&#039;s GOD!" Then the kid got crushed by a meteor. I&#039;m not even kidding.

Random detritus, an interview with Vasquez (in PDF), The Greatest Human Thinker, from Too Much Coffee Man Magazine, and The Ghost With Black Fingers, a two-page depression-fest.

I didn&#039;t include Squee or Johnny the Homicidal Maniac because A) They are easily found on TPB, and B) My scanner&#039;s busted. Mea culpa, I spilled tea on it.

The detritus is for the most part RARed. If I get any comments asking how to unRAR, I&#039;ll be pissed, so don&#039;t ask. The episodes of Zim are AVIs. DivX plays these well.

This is my apology for my previous torrent, which was pretty much a stillbirth, ZERO SEEDS. The episodes of Zim are great for kids, the rest... not so much.


Now for mind control: YOU LOVE THIS TORRENT AND WILL SEED FOREVER! IF YOU DON&#039;T SEED, YOU WILL DIE!
